column1: Kata Robata////The food here is absolutely magnificent
column2: and I everything is an absolute treat to the palate. I had the absolute honor of being waited on by Katie
column3: who is the crown jewel of this restaurant. She was kind
column5: had the kindest of things to say about absolutely everything on the menu
column6: and was the perfect representation for this establishment. If you have the fortunate experience of dining here and having her as your Hostess
column7: you're going to have the most perfect of evening. She is absolutely deserving of a raise and a promotion. A+
